Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails and calendar for any urgent updates or meetings.
Review the audit checklist and ensure it aligns with the fund's investment strategy and risk management framework.
Research specific audit procedures for verifying the fund's compliance with SEC regulations, including those related to insider trading, market manipulation, and investor protection.
Contact @facc-1 and @facc-2 to discuss the fund's accounting policies and procedures. Understand how transactions are recorded, valued, and reported.
Incorporate information from discussions with @facc-1 and @facc-2 into the audit checklist. Add sections on financial reporting, internal controls, and valuation of illiquid assets.
Review audit requirements for related party transactions. Identify any potential conflicts of interest and develop procedures for evaluating the fairness of related party transactions.
Refine the audit checklist to include specific procedures for verifying the fund's compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) regulations.
